Name: Seirai Island
Title: Seirai Island
Desc: "The great battle where the sea and sky changed color have become lost to time, but the vast storms that were called upon at this time still remain."

Talent.Name: Seirai Island
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After any character on either side is healed:</color> That character gains $[K1025]. (Takes 2 Piercing DMG at the End Phase. Can be used once)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 2</color>

K1025.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Distant Storm</color>
K1025.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> to the character to which this is attached.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>:1</color>

K4.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color>
K4.Desc: Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.
